m_szDocTitle: Cheaper Graphene Possible, say Caltech Researchers - The Green Optimistic
m_szDocSumamry: Cheaper Graphene Possible, say Caltech Researchers Benji Jerew March 23, 2015 Green News , Nanotechnology Caltech’s Dr. David Boyd and Dr. Nai-Chang Yeh, who stumbled upon a fast and cheap graphene manufacturing process. Since its official discovery just over a decade ago, graphene has taken the scientific world by storm, and scientists and researchers are just scratching the surface of possible applications in the modern and future world. Indeed, we’ve seen graphene applications in everything from electric vehicle battery packs to water purification , not to mention supercapacitors , hydrogen
